description: male figure in red loincloth is tied to a tree; arrows lodged in PL thigh, chest and in various areas of the tree; darkened landscape with moon in the URQ
inscription: Inscribed in pencil, verso: Karl Priebe / 154 Ontario | inscribed in pencil, verso: Miss Jarvis / Arts Club / 2nd floor Wrigley / south Bld.
markings: Brand stamp of HI-ART company, verso
provenance: The artist, Dudley Huppler; by descent to Thea Tenenbaum-Malferrari, Longmont, Colo.; given to MIA, 2017
signed: Signed and dated in white, LL: Karl Priebe / 10/4/41
title: Saint Sebastian
